title: Nano Banana Pro
summary:
Google DeepMind has unveiled Nano Banana Pro, a new state-of-the-art image generation and editing model built on the Gemini 3 Pro. Nano Banana Pro empowers users to visualize ideas, create infographics, and turn notes into diagrams with ease, leveraging Gemini's reasoning and real-world knowledge.

Key features include generating accurate visuals with legible text in multiple languages for mockups, posters, and international content. It enables the creation of high-fidelity visuals with consistent branding, advanced creative controls, and up to 4K resolution. Users can also blend up to 14 images while maintaining consistency of up to 5 people.

Nano Banana Pro will be available across various Google products. It is rolling out in the Gemini app, Google Ads, Workspace (Google Slides and Vids), the Gemini API, Google AI Studio, Google Antigravity, and Vertex AI, with varying levels of access and features for different user tiers (free, Pro, Ultra). It will also be available to Google AI Ultra subscribers in Flow.

Google emphasizes transparency by embedding SynthID digital watermarks in all AI-generated images. Users can verify if an image was generated by Google AI by uploading it into the Gemini app. A visible watermark (Gemini sparkle) will be used for free and Google AI Pro tier users, while it will be removed for Google AI Ultra subscribers and within the Google AI Studio developer tool.
chinese_title: 纳米香蕉 Pro
chinese_summary:
谷歌DeepMind发布Nano Banana Pro：基于Gemini 3 Pro的新一代图像生成和编辑模型。Nano Banana Pro利用Gemini的推理能力和真实世界知识，让用户轻松可视化想法、创建信息图表以及将笔记转化为图表。

主要功能包括为模型、海报和国际内容生成具有清晰文字和多种语言的精准视觉效果。它能够创建具有一致品牌、高级创意控制和高达4K分辨率的高保真视觉效果。用户还可以混合多达14张图像，同时保持多达5个人的形象一致性。

Nano Banana Pro将在各种谷歌产品中提供。它正在Gemini应用程序、Google Ads、Workspace（Google Slides和Vids）、Gemini API、Google AI Studio、Google Antigravity和Vertex AI中推出，针对不同的用户层级（免费、Pro、Ultra）提供不同级别的访问权限和功能。它也将向Flow中的Google AI Ultra订阅者开放。

谷歌强调透明度，通过在所有AI生成的图像中嵌入SynthID数字水印。用户可以通过将图像上传到Gemini应用程序来验证图像是否由Google AI生成。免费和Google AI Pro层级的用户将使用可见的水印（Gemini闪烁），而Google AI Ultra订阅者和Google AI Studio开发者工具中的用户将移除水印。

title: Red Alert 2 in web browser
summary:
Red Alert 2: Chrono Divide is a fan-made project recreating the classic Red Alert 2 RTS game in a web browser, eliminating the need for plugins or installations. Originally an experiment, the project aims for feature parity with the original game. A playable beta version is available, boasting multiplayer support and original maps.

The game runs cross-platform on any device with a modern web browser (Chrome, Edge, Safari preferred, Firefox less performant). It utilizes a client-server model for improved connectivity, offering modern controls and replay functionality. A key feature is its modding-friendly design, allowing easy installation and compatibility with existing Red Alert 2 mods.

The website details minimum/recommended PC specifications, emphasizing the need for a 64-bit operating system, at least 4GB of RAM, and a capable GPU. The developers encourage users to join their Discord server for community discussion and updates. The project is sustained by donations, which help cover infrastructure costs and support ongoing development. The site concludes with a link to play the beta.
chinese_title: 网页版红色警戒2
chinese_summary:
红色警戒2：时空裂痕是一个粉丝制作的项目，旨在网页浏览器中重现经典RTS游戏红色警戒2，无需插件或安装。该项目最初是一个实验，目标是与原版游戏的功能对等。目前已有一个可玩的测试版本，支持多人游戏和原版地图。

该游戏可在任何装有现代网络浏览器的设备上跨平台运行（首选Chrome、Edge、Safari，Firefox性能稍逊）。它采用客户端-服务器模型以提高连接性，提供现代化的控制和回放功能。一个关键特性是其便于模组修改的设计，可轻松安装并兼容现有的红色警戒2模组。

该网站详细说明了最低/推荐的电脑配置，强调需要64位操作系统、至少4GB内存和一个性能良好的GPU。开发者鼓励用户加入他们的Discord服务器进行社区讨论和获取更新。该项目由捐款维持，以帮助支付基础设施成本和支持持续开发。该网站最后提供了一个测试版游戏链接。

title: The Banished Bottom of the Housing Market
summary:
Ryan Puzycki's article "The Banished Bottom of the Housing Market" argues that the disappearance of Single-Room Occupancy (SRO) units, the cheapest form of housing, significantly contributes to modern homelessness. Once a vibrant and affordable option provided by institutions like the YMCA and various residential hotels, SROs offered flexibility, independence, and affordability at scale for low-income individuals.

The article details how SROs were intentionally destroyed through a combination of factors. During the Progressive Era, reformers stigmatized hotel life, viewing it as morally corrupt and blaming it for societal ills. This led to the implementation of building and health codes, exclusionary zoning, and urban renewal projects that targeted and eliminated SROs. These policies effectively erased the "banished bottom" of the housing market.

Industrial job shifts, highway construction, and urban development further accelerated the decline. Official statistics failed to recognize SROs as permanent housing, allowing their demolition without accounting for displacement. By the mid-20th century, millions of SRO rooms had vanished.

Puzycki contends that the current homelessness crisis is a direct consequence of this destruction. He highlights the need to re-legalize shared housing and suggests converting vacant office spaces into affordable co-living units as a viable solution. While acknowledging the need for subsidies, he argues that this approach can offer a quicker and more cost-effective way to address the shortage of deeply affordable housing, providing a crucial rung on the housing ladder for the most vulnerable populations.
chinese_title: 被遗弃的楼市底部
chinese_summary:
瑞恩·普日茨基的文章《被驱逐的住房市场底层》认为，单间房（SRO）的消失——最廉价的住房形式——是造成现代无家可归现象的重要原因。单间房曾经是 YMCA 和各种住宅酒店等机构提供的充满活力且负担得起的选择，为低收入人群提供了大规模的灵活性、独立性和可负担性。

文章详细描述了单间房是如何通过多种因素的共同作用而被故意摧毁的。在进步时代，改革者们污名化酒店生活，认为它在道德上是腐败的，并将其归咎于社会弊病。这导致了建筑和卫生法规、排斥性分区以及城市更新项目的实施，这些项目针对并消除了单间房。这些政策有效地抹去了住房市场的“被驱逐底层”。

工业岗位转移、高速公路建设和城市发展进一步加速了这种衰落。官方统计数据未能将单间房视为永久性住房，从而允许在不考虑人口流离失所的情况下拆除它们。到 20 世纪中叶，数百万个单间房已经消失。

普日茨基认为，当前的无家可归危机是这种破坏的直接后果。他强调需要重新将合租住房合法化，并建议将空置的办公空间改造成经济适用型的合住单元，作为一种可行的解决方案。在承认需要补贴的同时，他认为这种方法可以提供一种更快、更具成本效益的方式来解决深度经济适用房的短缺问题，为最脆弱的人群提供住房阶梯上的关键一环。

title: Interactive World History Atlas Since 3000 BC
summary: This article introduces an interactive world history atlas spanning from 3000 BC to the present day. Its core offering is a collection of world history maps and timelines, visually representing kingdoms, battles, and expeditions throughout history. The atlas covers a wide range of historical aspects, including political, military, artistic, scientific, literary, religious, and philosophical developments, allowing for comparative historical analysis. The maps are based on a vector database, suggesting a high level of detail and interactivity. Essentially, this resource provides a dynamic and comprehensive visual exploration of world history across millennia.
chinese_title: 公元前3000年至今互动世界历史地图集
chinese_summary: 互动世界历史地图集 (公元前3000年至今): 该地图集的核心内容是一系列世界历史地图和时间轴，以可视化的方式呈现历史上各王国、战役和远征。它涵盖了政治、军事、艺术、科学、文学、宗教和哲学等广泛的历史层面，从而实现比较历史分析。地图基于矢量数据库，表明具有高度的细节和互动性。本质上，该资源提供了对跨越数千年的世界历史的动态和全面的视觉探索。

title: Firefox 147 Will Support the XDG Base Directory Specification
summary: Firefox 147 will finally support the XDG Base Directory Specification, resolving a 21-year-old bug report. This means Firefox will adhere to the standard Linux convention of placing application data, configuration files, and cached assets in their designated XDG directories (e.g., `~/.config` and `~/.local/share`) instead of solely under the `~/.mozilla` directory. The support for this specification and associated commits was merged recently, closing the long-open bug. This change will make Firefox more consistent with other Linux applications in terms of file organization.
chinese_title: Firefox 147 将支持 XDG 基本目录规范
chinese_summary: Firefox 147将支持XDG基本目录规范，修复一个存在21年的漏洞。这意味着Firefox将遵循标准的Linux约定，把应用程序数据、配置文件和缓存资源放置在指定的XDG目录中（例如，`~/.config` 和 `~/.local/share`），而不是仅仅放在 `~/.mozilla` 目录下。对该规范的支持和相关提交已于近日合并，关闭了这个长期存在的漏洞。此项更改将使Firefox在文件组织方面与Linux下的其他应用程序更加一致。

Based on the content (extracted from the PDF data), the article seems to explore techniques for managing side effects in a purely functional manner, enhancing code modularity and extensibility. It is likely discussing how Freer Monads provide a way to represent effects as data, decoupling the definition of effects from their interpretation. This allows programmers to define custom effects and combine them flexibly. The term "extensible effects" suggests that the paper focuses on how these effect systems can be easily extended with new effects without modifying existing code.

The article probably delves into the practical implications of these techniques, potentially showcasing examples of how Freer Monads can be used to build more modular and maintainable functional programs. It might explore the performance trade-offs associated with this approach and compare it to other effect management techniques like monad transformers or algebraic effects.

Because the extracted content consists of binary data, it is hard to create a precise summarization. However, from the title and the few recognizable words and phrases, it can be assumed to be a technical exploration of functional programming concepts around effect management and code extensibility, potentially aiming to present a more flexible and powerful approach to effect handling compared to traditional methods.
chinese_title: 更自由的Monad，更可扩展的效应 [pdf]
chinese_summary:
本文档，标题为“自由Monad，更具扩展性的效果”，似乎是一篇关于函数式编程的技术论文或文章，特别是涉及自由Monad和可扩展效果的概念。

根据内容（从PDF数据中提取），该文章似乎探讨了以纯函数式方式管理副作用的技术，从而增强代码的模块化和可扩展性。它可能讨论了自由Monad如何将效果表示为数据，将效果的定义与其解释分离。这允许程序员定义自定义效果并灵活地组合它们。“可扩展效果”一词表明该论文侧重于如何轻松地用新的效果扩展这些效果系统，而无需修改现有代码。

该文章可能深入探讨了这些技术的实际意义，可能会展示自由Monad如何用于构建更模块化和可维护的函数式程序的示例。它可能会探讨与此方法相关的性能权衡，并将其与其他效果管理技术（如Monad转换器或代数效果）进行比较。

由于提取的内容由二进制数据组成，因此很难创建精确的摘要。但是，从标题和少数可识别的单词和短语来看，可以假定它是一项对围绕效果管理和代码可扩展性的函数式编程概念的技术探索，可能旨在呈现一种比传统方法更灵活，更强大的效果处理方法。

title: Android and iPhone users can now share files, starting with the Pixel 10 family
summary: Google is introducing a new feature that allows Android's Quick Share to work with Apple's AirDrop, enabling easier file sharing between Android and iPhone devices. This functionality is initially rolling out to the Pixel 10 family of devices. The initiative aims to simplify file sharing regardless of the device's operating system. Google emphasizes the security aspect, highlighting that the file transfer method includes strong security measures tested by independent experts. This move builds upon Google's efforts to improve compatibility between operating systems, such as their work on RCS and unknown tracker alerts. The company plans to improve and expand this feature to more Android devices in the future. A video showcasing the new feature on the Pixel 10 Pro is available.
chinese_title: Android和iPhone用户现在可以共享文件了，从Pixel 10系列开始。
chinese_summary: 谷歌推出新功能，Android“快速分享”将与Apple“隔空投送”兼容，简化Android和iPhone设备之间的文件共享。此功能最初将在Pixel 10系列设备上推出。该计划旨在简化文件共享，无论设备操作系统如何。谷歌强调安全性，指出文件传输方法包含经过独立专家测试的强大安全措施。此举建立在谷歌改善操作系统兼容性的努力之上，例如他们在RCS和未知追踪器警报方面的工作。该公司计划在未来改进和扩展此功能到更多Android设备。Pixel 10 Pro上的新功能演示视频已发布。

title: Theft of the Weeping Woman from the National Gallery of Victoria
summary:
In 1986, Pablo Picasso's "The Weeping Woman," owned by the National Gallery of Victoria in Melbourne, was stolen by a group calling themselves the "Australian Cultural Terrorists." This painting, part of a series inspired by Picasso's "Guernica," had been purchased for a then-record A$1.6 million. The thieves demanded a 10% increase in arts funding over three years and the establishment of an art prize, "The Picasso Ransom." Their demands were accompanied by insulting letters to the Arts Minister, Race Mathews.

The Victorian government refused to negotiate, offering a A$50,000 reward instead. After an anonymous tip, the painting was found undamaged in a locker at Spencer Street railway station on August 19, 1986. The thieves included a third letter stating their aim was to highlight the plight of artists who lack the means to influence the government. The case was closed in 1989 without any arrests.

The theft became a significant event in Australian art history, inspiring a film ("A Kink in the Picasso"), a documentary ("The Picasso Ransom"), and several novels, including Anson Cameron's "Stealing Picasso." The theft has been described as Australia's greatest unsolved art heist. Despite the passage of time, "The Weeping Woman" remains a popular and valuable work in the National Gallery of Victoria's collection, valued at A$100 million in 2016.
chinese_title: 维多利亚国家美术馆《哭泣的女人》失窃案
chinese_summary:
1986年，墨尔本维多利亚国家美术馆收藏的巴勃罗·毕加索的《哭泣的女人》被一个自称“澳大利亚文化恐怖分子”的团体盗走。这幅画作是受毕加索《格尔尼卡》启发的一系列作品之一，当时以创纪录的160万澳元购得。盗贼要求在三年内将艺术资金增加10%，并设立一个名为“毕加索赎金”的艺术奖。与此同时，他们还向艺术部长雷斯·马修斯发出了侮辱性的信件。

维多利亚州政府拒绝谈判，转而悬赏5万澳元。在收到一封匿名举报信后，这幅画于1986年8月19日在斯宾塞街火车站的一个储物柜里被完好无损地找到。盗贼还附上第三封信，声称他们的目的是为了引起人们对缺乏影响政府手段的艺术家的困境的关注。此案于1989年结案，无人被捕。

这起盗窃案成为澳大利亚艺术史上的一个重大事件，激发了一部电影（《毕加索的小插曲》）、一部纪录片（《毕加索赎金》）和几部小说，包括安森·卡梅伦的《偷窃毕加索》。这起盗窃案被描述为澳大利亚最伟大的未破艺术品劫案。尽管时过境迁，《哭泣的女人》仍然是维多利亚国家美术馆收藏中一件受欢迎且有价值的作品，2016年估值为1亿澳元。

title: Android/Linux Dual Boot
summary:
This article from the postmarketOS Wiki outlines various methods for dual-booting Android and postmarketOS (pmOS) on Android devices. It covers booting methods and storage options, requiring `pmbootstrap` for many approaches.

**Booting Methods:**

*   **Computer Boot:** Simplest, uses `pmbootstrap flasher boot` in fastboot mode, doesn't modify the phone if used with an SD card.
*   **Recovery Partition:** Overwrites Android recovery, flashing the pmOS kernel (`boot.img` via `fastboot flash recovery`) to the recovery partition. Requires a method to store pmOS, like Stowaway.
*   **A/B Slots:** Flashes pmOS to the system partition of the inactive slot (A or B). Slots can be switched using `fastboot` or Android apps like Switch My Slot and BootControl. `qbootctl` is used in pmOS to switch back.
*   **U-Boot/lk2nd/lk1st:** Uses device's bootloader capabilities (U-Boot or lk2nd) to select the OS to boot.
*   **kexec:** Potentially works if supported by either Android or pmOS.

**Storage Options:**

*   **Stowaway:** Stores pmOS files in a folder (`.stowaway/pmos/`) within an existing partition (typically userdata), useful when modifying partitions is risky. It requires a preparation script and unpacking the pmOS root filesystem via tar.
*   **SD Card:** Flashes the pmOS file system directly to an SD card for use as the pmOS root.
*   **Custom Partition:** Creates dedicated partitions for pmOS. Requires shrinking the userdata partition first. Two schemes exist: "Subpartitions" requiring partition name with "system" prefix; or "Use the whole storage device" requiring pmOS_boot and pmOS_root labels on the filesystem.

The article also touches on the dangers of modifying partitions and emphasizes caution when attempting custom partitioning. It mentions resources for further information and dual booting on specific devices.
chinese_title: 安卓/Linux双启动
chinese_summary:
这篇来自postmarketOS Wiki的文章概述了在Android设备上双启动Android和postmarketOS (pmOS) 的各种方法。它涵盖了启动方法和存储选项，许多方法需要使用 `pmbootstrap`。

**启动方法：**

*   **电脑启动：** 最简单，在fastboot模式下使用 `pmbootstrap flasher boot`，如果与SD卡一起使用，则不会修改手机。
*   **Recovery分区：** 覆盖Android Recovery，将pmOS内核（通过 `fastboot flash recovery` 刷入的 `boot.img`）刷入Recovery分区。需要一种存储pmOS的方法，例如Stowaway。
*   **A/B槽位：** 将pmOS刷入非活跃槽位（A或B）的系统分区。可以使用 `fastboot` 或Android应用程序（如Switch My Slot和BootControl）切换槽位。`qbootctl` 用于在pmOS中切换回来。
*   **U-Boot/lk2nd/lk1st：** 使用设备的引导加载程序功能（U-Boot或lk2nd）来选择要启动的操作系统。
*   **kexec：** 如果Android或pmOS支持，则可能有效。

**存储选项：**

*   **Stowaway：** 将pmOS文件存储在现有分区（通常是userdata）中的一个文件夹（`.stowaway/pmos/`）中，在修改分区有风险时很有用。它需要一个准备脚本，并通过tar解压pmOS根文件系统。
*   **SD卡：** 将pmOS文件系统直接刷入SD卡，用作pmOS根目录。
*   **自定义分区：** 为pmOS创建专用分区。需要先缩小userdata分区。存在两种方案："子分区"需要带有 "system" 前缀的分区名称；或者"使用整个存储设备"需要在文件系统上使用 pmOS_boot 和 pmOS_root 标签。

该文章还提到了修改分区的危险，并强调尝试自定义分区时要谨慎。它提到了更多信息的资源以及在特定设备上双启动的方法。

title: 40 years ago, Calvin and Hobbes' burst onto the page
summary:
This article commemorates the 40th anniversary of the debut of the comic strip "Calvin and Hobbes" on November 18, 1985. It highlights the unique appeal of the strip, focusing on the imaginative adventures of 6-year-old Calvin and his tiger companion, Hobbes, who is real to Calvin but appears as a stuffed animal to others.

The article features excerpts from a 2005 interview with Lee Salem, the editor of "Calvin and Hobbes." Salem emphasizes the strip's freshness, humor, and strong art, noting how Calvin embodied the childhood experience of dealing with the adult world. He shares a favorite strip example showcasing Calvin's humorous take on learning from television. Salem views Hobbes as Calvin's alter ego, providing commentary and balance. He explains that the reality of Hobbes is open to interpretation, but crucial to Calvin's world.

The article also touches on the reasons behind the strip's creator, Bill Watterson's, decision to end "Calvin and Hobbes" in 1995, citing his desire to explore different artistic avenues beyond the constraints of the comic strip format. Despite the strip's relatively short run of ten years, it left a lasting impact due to Watterson's ability to blend silliness, fantasy, and profound themes.
chinese_title: 40年前，《卡尔文与霍布斯》横空出世。
chinese_summary:
本文纪念漫画《卡尔文与霍布斯》于1985年11月18日首次亮相四十周年。文章着重介绍了这部漫画的独特魅力，关注了六岁男孩卡尔文和他老虎伙伴霍布斯的奇妙冒险。霍布斯对卡尔文来说是真实的，但在其他人看来只是一个毛绒玩具。

文章节选了2005年对《卡尔文与霍布斯》的编辑李·塞勒姆的采访。塞勒姆强调了这部漫画的新鲜感、幽默感和出色的艺术性，并指出卡尔文如何体现了儿童时期与成人世界打交道的经历。他分享了一个他最喜欢的漫画片段，展示了卡尔文对从电视中学习的幽默看法。塞勒姆认为霍布斯是卡尔文的另一个自我，提供了评论和平衡。他解释说，霍布斯的真实性是可以解释的，但对卡尔文的世界至关重要。

文章还涉及了这部漫画的创作者比尔·沃特森在1995年决定结束《卡尔文与霍布斯》的原因，引用了他希望探索漫画形式之外的不同艺术道路的愿望。尽管这部漫画的连载时间相对较短，只有十年，但由于沃特森融合了愚蠢、幻想和深刻主题的能力，它留下了持久的影响。

title: IBM Delivers New Quantum Package
summary:
In a press release from November 12, 2025, IBM announced significant advancements in its quantum computing program, targeting quantum advantage by the end of 2026 and fault-tolerant quantum computing by 2029.

Key highlights include the unveiling of the IBM Quantum Nighthawk processor, designed for quantum advantage with 120 qubits, increased connectivity, and the ability to execute more complex circuits. IBM anticipates Nighthawk-based systems to support an increasing number of two-qubit gates in the coming years. The company is also contributing to a community-led quantum advantage tracker to validate quantum advantage claims alongside Algorithmiq, the Flatiron Institute, and BlueQubit.

IBM is also advancing Qiskit, its quantum software stack, to enhance accuracy and reduce the cost of extracting results. They are also improving the usability of Qiskit for scientific computing.

On the path to fault-tolerant computing, IBM announced IBM Quantum Loon, an experimental processor demonstrating key components needed for this goal, including long-range qubit connections and qubit reset technologies. They have also achieved efficient quantum error correction decoding ahead of schedule.

To accelerate quantum wafer development, IBM is scaling fabrication to a 300mm facility. This transition has already doubled research and development speed, increased chip complexity tenfold, and enabled parallel research designs.
chinese_title: IBM 发布全新量子软件包
chinese_summary:
在2025年11月12日的新闻稿中，IBM宣布其量子计算项目取得重大进展，目标是在2026年底实现量子优势，并在2029年实现容错量子计算。

主要亮点包括推出IBM Quantum Nighthawk处理器，该处理器专为量子优势而设计，具有120个量子比特、更高的连接性和执行更复杂电路的能力。IBM预计基于Nighthawk的系统将在未来几年支持越来越多的双量子比特门。该公司还在与Algorithmiq、Flatiron Institute和BlueQubit合作，为社区主导的量子优势跟踪器做出贡献，以验证量子优势声明。

IBM还在推进其量子软件堆栈Qiskit，以提高准确性并降低提取结果的成本。他们还在提高Qiskit在科学计算中的可用性。

在通往容错计算的道路上，IBM发布了IBM Quantum Loon，这是一个实验性处理器，展示了实现该目标所需的关键组件，包括远程量子比特连接和量子比特重置技术。他们还提前实现了高效的量子纠错解码。

为了加速量子晶圆的开发，IBM正在将制造规模扩大到300毫米的工厂。这一转变已经使研发速度提高了一倍，芯片复杂度提高了十倍，并实现了并行研究设计。

title: Adversarial Poetry as a Universal Single-Turn Jailbreak Mechanism in LLMs
summary:
This arXiv preprint, submitted in November 2025, presents research demonstrating that "adversarial poetry" can act as a universal jailbreak mechanism for Large Language Models (LLMs). The study, conducted by Bisconti et al., found that crafting prompts in a poetic style significantly increases the success rate (ASR) of eliciting harmful or disallowed responses from a wide range of both proprietary and open-source LLMs.

The researchers experimented with 25 different LLMs and observed that poetic prompts, both hand-crafted and generated through a standardized meta-prompt converting harmful requests into verse, bypassed safety mechanisms more effectively than their prose counterparts. They mapped the successful prompts to risk taxonomies like MLCommons and the EU CoP, showing the vulnerability extends across domains like CBRN threats, manipulation, cyber-offenses, and loss-of-control scenarios.

The study reports an average jailbreak success rate of 62% for hand-crafted poems and 43% for meta-prompt-generated poems, compared to significantly lower rates for non-poetic baselines. The outputs from the LLMs were rigorously evaluated using an ensemble of open-weight judge models and a human-validated subset, with disagreements resolved manually.

The findings suggest that stylistic variation alone is sufficient to circumvent current LLM safety measures, highlighting fundamental limitations in existing alignment methods and evaluation protocols. The research emphasizes the systematic vulnerability of LLMs to adversarial poetry and calls for a re-evaluation of safety training and evaluation strategies.
chinese_title: 对抗性诗歌：LLM通用单轮越狱机制
chinese_summary:
这篇于2025年11月提交的arXiv预印本展示了一项研究，证明“对抗性诗歌”可作为大型语言模型（LLM）的通用越狱机制。 Bisconti等人进行的研究发现，以诗歌风格编写提示显著提高了从各种专有和开源LLM中引出有害或不允许的回应的成功率（ASR）。

研究人员对25种不同的LLM进行了实验，观察到诗歌提示（包括手工制作的和通过将有害请求转换为诗句的标准元提示生成的）比散文提示更有效地绕过了安全机制。他们将成功的提示映射到MLCommons和欧盟CoP等风险分类法，表明这种漏洞扩展到CBRN威胁、操纵、网络犯罪和失控场景等领域。

该研究报告称，手工制作的诗歌的平均越狱成功率为62％，元提示生成的诗歌的成功率为43％，而非诗歌基线的成功率则明显较低。 使用开放权重判断模型集合和人工验证的子集对LLM的输出进行了严格评估，并通过手动方式解决了分歧。

研究结果表明，仅风格变化就足以规避当前的LLM安全措施，突出了现有对齐方法和评估协议的根本局限性。该研究强调了LLM对对抗性诗歌的系统性漏洞，并呼吁重新评估安全培训和评估策略。

title: CUDA Ontology
summary:
This article provides a rigorous ontology of CUDA, clarifying its often overloaded terminology and outlining the relationships between its components. It disambiguates the term "CUDA" itself, distinguishing between compute architecture, instruction set, source language, Toolkit, and Runtime. It also clarifies the different meanings of "kernel" (OS vs. CUDA) and "driver" (NVIDIA GPU Driver vs. CUDA Driver API).

The article then details the layered architecture of CUDA, spanning from the application layer (PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.) down to the GPU hardware. Key components are defined: `libcudart.so` (Runtime API), `libcuda.so` (Driver API), CUDA Toolkit (including `nvcc`), and the NVIDIA GPU Driver. The distinction between build-time and execution-time dependencies is emphasized.

Crucially, the article addresses version semantics, covering compute capability (CC), GPU driver version, CUDA Toolkit version, Runtime API version, and Driver API version. It explains how these versions interrelate and affect compatibility.

Finally, it explains the compatibility rules: CUDA drivers are forward compatible (newer drivers support older runtime versions via PTX JIT compilation), but backward compatibility is not supported (older drivers cannot support newer runtime versions). It emphasizes the importance of understanding these rules to avoid version conflicts and ensure CUDA applications run correctly.
chinese_title: CUDA本体
chinese_summary:
本文提供了一个严谨的 CUDA 本体论，阐明了其经常被过度使用的术语，并概述了其组件之间的关系。它明确了术语“CUDA”本身的含义，区分了计算架构、指令集、源代码语言、工具包和运行时。它还阐明了“kernel”（操作系统 vs. CUDA）和“driver”（NVIDIA GPU 驱动程序 vs. CUDA 驱动程序 API）的不同含义。

本文然后详细介绍了 CUDA 的分层架构，从应用层（PyTorch、TensorFlow 等）向下延伸到 GPU 硬件。定义了关键组件：`libcudart.so` (运行时 API)、`libcuda.so` (驱动程序 API)、CUDA 工具包（包括 `nvcc`）以及 NVIDIA GPU 驱动程序。强调了构建时和执行时依赖关系的区别。

至关重要的是，本文阐述了版本语义，涵盖了计算能力 (CC)、GPU 驱动程序版本、CUDA 工具包版本、运行时 API 版本和驱动程序 API 版本。它解释了这些版本如何相互关联并影响兼容性。

最后，它解释了兼容性规则：CUDA 驱动程序是向前兼容的（较新的驱动程序通过 PTX JIT 编译支持较旧的运行时版本），但不支持向后兼容（较旧的驱动程序无法支持较新的运行时版本）。它强调了理解这些规则的重要性，以避免版本冲突并确保 CUDA 应用程序正确运行。

title: Basalt Woven Textile
summary:
Basalt Woven Textile is a textile made from natural basalt rock, created by melting the rock at 1400°C and extruding it into filaments. This process results in a material with exceptional tensile strength, more than double that of steel.

The textile boasts several advantageous properties: high corrosive and chemical resistance, exceeding alloyed steel in strength by 2.5 times and glass fiber by 1.5 times. It can be used in heat-insulating applications up to 700°C, and certain compositions can withstand up to 800°C.

Furthermore, basalt fiber offers high electric-insulating characteristics and electromagnetic radiation transparency, making it suitable for producing electric insulating materials for both low and high-voltage equipment.

The material's sensorial properties include a satin glossiness, closed structure, smooth texture, and warm temperature. Technically, it exhibits good fire, UV, weather, scratch, and chemical resistance. It is lightweight but is not a renewable resource. Key tags associated with the textile are "Curious," "Lightweight," and "Natural stones." The brand is Vulkan Europe, and it originates from the Netherlands.
chinese_title: 玄武岩编织物
chinese_summary:
玄武岩编织纺织品是一种由天然玄武岩制成的纺织品，通过在1400°C下熔化岩石并将其挤压成丝而制成。这一过程造就了一种具有卓越抗拉强度，超过钢材两倍以上的材料。

该纺织品具有多种优势：高耐腐蚀性和耐化学性，强度分别是合金钢的2.5倍和玻璃纤维的1.5倍。它可用于高达700°C的隔热应用，某些成分甚至可以承受高达800°C的温度。

此外，玄武岩纤维具有高电绝缘特性和电磁辐射透明性，使其适用于生产低压和高压设备的电绝缘材料。

该材料的感官特性包括缎面光泽、封闭结构、光滑纹理和温暖的温度。在技术上，它表现出良好的防火、防紫外线、耐候、防刮擦和耐化学性。它重量轻，但不是可再生资源。与该纺织品相关的关键词是“好奇”、“轻质”和“天然石材”。品牌是Vulkan Europe，原产地是荷兰。

title: Smart Performance Hacks for Faster Python Code
summary:
This article provides 10 performance optimization hacks for Python code, targeting developers looking to improve execution speed and efficiency.

1.  **Sets for Membership Testing:** Use sets instead of lists for membership checks due to their O(1) average lookup time compared to lists' O(n).
2.  **Avoid Unnecessary Copies:** Modify objects in place instead of creating copies to reduce memory usage and improve performance.
3.  **`__slots__` for Memory Efficiency:** Define fixed attributes in classes using `__slots__` to reduce memory overhead by eliminating the dynamic `__dict__`.
4.  **Math Functions:** Utilize functions from the `math` module (implemented in C) for numerical computations for better performance and precision.
5.  **Pre-allocate Memory:** Pre-allocate memory for lists or arrays with known sizes to avoid dynamic resizing overhead.
6.  **Avoid Exception Handling in Loops:** Use conditional checks to prevent errors instead of relying on exception handling within performance-critical loops.
7.  **Local Functions:** Define frequently used logic as local functions to improve name resolution speed.
8.  **Itertools for Combinatorial Operations:** Use the `itertools` module for efficient generation of permutations, combinations, and other iterator-based tasks.
9.  **Bisect for Sorted Lists:** Employ the `bisect` module for maintaining sorted order in lists using binary search for efficient insertions and searches.
10. **Avoid repeated function calls in loops:** Avoid calling the same function multiple times inside a loop.
The article also highlights PyCharm's features like intelligent code completion for the `math` module and the AI Assistant's "Suggest Refactoring" tool for code improvement suggestions. Each hack includes benchmarked code examples demonstrating the performance gains.
chinese_title: 加速Python代码的智能性能技巧
chinese_summary:
本文针对希望提高Python代码执行速度和效率的开发者，提供了10个Python代码性能优化技巧。

1. **集合用于成员检测：** 使用集合代替列表进行成员检查，因为集合的平均查找时间复杂度为O(1)，而列表为O(n)。
2. **避免不必要的复制：** 直接修改对象，而不是创建副本，以减少内存使用并提高性能。
3. **`__slots__`提高内存效率：** 使用`__slots__`在类中定义固定属性，通过消除动态`__dict__`来减少内存开销。
4. **数学函数：** 利用`math`模块（以C语言实现）中的函数进行数值计算，以获得更好的性能和精度。
5. **预分配内存：** 为已知大小的列表或数组预先分配内存，以避免动态调整大小的开销。
6. **避免在循环中使用异常处理：** 使用条件检查来防止错误，而不是在对性能至关重要的循环中依赖异常处理。
7. **局部函数：** 将常用逻辑定义为局部函数，以提高名称解析速度。
8. **Itertools用于组合操作：** 使用`itertools`模块高效生成排列、组合和其他基于迭代器的任务。
9. **Bisect用于排序列表：** 使用`bisect`模块通过二分查找来维护列表中已排序的顺序，以实现高效的插入和搜索。
10. **避免在循环中重复函数调用：** 避免在循环内部多次调用相同的函数。
本文还重点介绍了PyCharm的功能，如用于`math`模块的智能代码补全以及AI助手的“建议重构”工具，可提供代码改进建议。 每个技巧都包含基准测试代码示例，展示了性能提升。

title: Europe is scaling back GDPR and relaxing AI laws
summary:
Europe is scaling back its landmark GDPR and AI laws under pressure from Big Tech and the US government, aiming to cut red tape and boost economic growth. The European Commission proposes changes to GDPR, making it easier for companies to share anonymized and pseudonymized data and allowing AI companies to use personal data for model training, provided it complies with GDPR. The AI Act's rules governing high-risk AI systems are delayed until "needed standards and support tools are available." Cookie banners will be reduced, with non-risk cookies not triggering pop-ups and users controlling others via central browser controls.

Other amendments include simplified AI documentation for smaller companies, a unified cybersecurity incident reporting interface, and centralized AI oversight. Henna Virkkunen of the European Commission argues these changes simplify EU laws while protecting fundamental rights. The proposal now goes to the European Parliament and EU member states for approval, a process expected to be contentious. Critics argue the changes weaken fundamental safeguards and pander to Big Tech's influence following pressure from companies, Donald Trump, and figures like Mario Draghi. The Commission frames the moves as streamlining regulations to improve global competitiveness, particularly in the AI race dominated by US and Chinese companies.
chinese_title: 欧洲正在缩减GDPR并放宽人工智能法律。
chinese_summary:
在大型科技公司和美国政府的压力下，欧洲正在缩减其具有里程碑意义的 GDPR 和 AI 法案，旨在减少繁文缛节并促进经济增长。欧盟委员会提议修改 GDPR，使公司更容易共享匿名化和假名化数据，并允许人工智能公司使用个人数据进行模型训练，前提是符合 GDPR。人工智能法案中关于高风险人工智能系统的规则被推迟到“所需的标准和支持工具可用”。Cookie 横幅将会减少，非风险 Cookie 不会触发弹出窗口，用户可以通过中央浏览器控件控制其他 Cookie。

其他修正案包括简化小型公司的人工智能文档，统一的网络安全事件报告界面，以及集中式的人工智能监督。欧盟委员会的 Henna Virkkunen 认为，这些修改简化了欧盟法律，同时保护了基本权利。该提案现在将提交欧洲议会和欧盟成员国批准，预计这一过程将充满争议。批评人士认为，这些修改削弱了基本保障措施，并屈从于大型科技公司的影响，此前这些公司、唐纳德·特朗普和马里奥·德拉吉等人物施加了压力。欧盟委员会将此举定位为精简法规，以提高全球竞争力，尤其是在美国和中国公司主导的人工智能竞赛中。

title: Towards Interplanetary QUIC Traffic
summary:
This article details a project aiming to adapt the QUIC internet protocol for reliable communication in deep space. The current deep space networking architecture faces limitations as space exploration expands, making QUIC a promising alternative. However, the immense latency (3-23 minutes to Mars) and intermittent connectivity in deep space prevent QUIC from working with its default settings designed for terrestrial internet.

The project focuses on finding custom QUIC configurations that can handle these challenges through experimentation. Initial experiments using virtual machines to simulate the deep space network proved slow due to the introduced latencies. To accelerate the process, the author developed a novel approach involving a time-jumping clock and an in-process simulated network. This allows for "instantaneous" experiments within a single process, where client and server communicate without real network IO.

This new setup allows precise control over the network, enabling deterministic runs and enhanced debuggability through synthetic .pcap file recording for packet inspection. The author implemented the clock and network features in Quinn, a Rust QUIC library. The project's goal is to demonstrate QUIC's viability in deep space and provide guidelines for its deployment, potentially replacing protocols like CFDP currently used for transmitting data from Mars.
chinese_title: 迈向星际QUIC流量
chinese_summary:
本项目旨在将QUIC互联网协议适配于深空可靠通信。随着深空探索的扩展，当前的深空网络架构面临局限性，QUIC因此成为一个有前景的替代方案。然而，深空中巨大的延迟（到达火星需要3-23分钟）和间歇性连接使得QUIC无法使用其为地面互联网设计的默认设置。

该项目专注于通过实验寻找能够应对这些挑战的定制QUIC配置。使用虚拟机模拟深空网络的初步实验由于引入的延迟而速度缓慢。为了加速这一过程，作者开发了一种涉及时间跳跃时钟和进程内模拟网络的新方法。这允许在单个进程中进行“瞬时”实验，客户端和服务器在没有真实网络IO的情况下进行通信。

这种新设置可以精确控制网络，从而实现确定性运行，并通过合成的.pcap文件记录进行数据包检查，从而增强可调试性。作者在Rust QUIC库Quinn中实现了时钟和网络功能。该项目的目标是展示QUIC在深空中的可行性，并为它的部署提供指导，有可能取代目前用于从火星传输数据的CFDP等协议。

title: DOS Days – Laptop Displays
summary:
This article on "DOS Days - Laptop Displays" explores the evolution of display technologies used in early laptop computers, primarily during the DOS era. Initially, heavy CRT (Cathode Ray Tube) monitors were used in luggable PCs due to their affordability. However, the industry quickly shifted towards LCD (Liquid Crystal Display) technology for its energy efficiency and compact size.

Early LCDs required external backlights or sidelights to be readable, and suffered from poor contrast and ghosting. Gas plasma displays offered brighter, sharper images but consumed too much power for portable use.

The introduction of STN (Supertwist Nematic) displays improved resolution, but retained the ghosting effect. DSTN (Double Layer Supertwist Nematic) technology addressed the slow refresh rate of STN screens, but still struggled with low contrast and washed-out colors.

Finally, TFT (Thin Film Transistor) or "active-matrix" displays emerged, offering superior contrast, faster refresh rates, and higher resolutions, solving the major drawbacks of passive-matrix displays. While initially more expensive, TFT displays became the standard, paving the way for modern laptop screens, and are still widely used today. The article highlights the progression from bulky, power-hungry CRTs to the sophisticated TFT technology, marking a significant advancement in portable computing.
chinese_title: DOS时代 – 笔记本电脑显示器
chinese_summary:
DOS时代 - 笔记本电脑显示器

本文探讨了早期笔记本电脑（主要在DOS时代）所使用的显示技术的演变。最初，由于阴极射线管(CRT)显示器价格低廉，便携式电脑普遍采用笨重的CRT显示器。然而，由于液晶显示(LCD)技术的节能和小型化优势，行业迅速转向LCD技术。

早期的LCD需要外部背光或侧光才能清晰显示，并且存在对比度差和拖影问题。 气体等离子显示器虽然提供了更明亮、更清晰的图像，但功耗过高，不适合便携使用。

超扭曲向列(STN)显示器的引入提高了分辨率，但仍然存在拖影效应。 双层超扭曲向列(DSTN)技术解决了STN屏幕刷新率慢的问题，但仍然存在对比度低和色彩黯淡的问题。

最终，薄膜晶体管(TFT)或“有源矩阵”显示器问世，提供了卓越的对比度、更快的刷新率和更高的分辨率，解决了无源矩阵显示器的主要缺点。 虽然最初价格较高，但TFT显示器逐渐成为标准，为现代笔记本电脑屏幕铺平了道路，并且至今仍被广泛使用。 本文重点介绍了从笨重、耗电的CRT到精密的TFT技术的演变，标志着便携式计算领域的重大进步。

title: Scientists Reveal How the Maya Predicted Eclipses for Centuries
summary:
Researchers have cracked the code on a Maya calendar within the Dresden Codex, revealing how the civilization accurately predicted solar eclipses for centuries. The Dresden Codex, a rare surviving text from pre-colonial Maya society, contains detailed astronomical and astrological information, including a table spanning 405 lunar months (11,960 days) used for eclipse prediction.

For years, scientists struggled to understand how the table functioned, with the prevailing theory suggesting it operated on a continuous loop. However, linguist John Justeson and archaeologist Justin Lowry proposed a new interpretation, suggesting the table was not reset at its final position. Instead, they suggest that a new table is begun in the 358th month of the current table.

Their research demonstrates that the Maya initiated a new table in the 358th month of the preceding one, and occasionally in the 223rd month to fine-tune for accruing deviations. By comparing the table to modern astronomical data, the researchers found this method would have allowed the Maya to accurately predict every solar eclipse visible in their region between 350 and 1150 CE, accounting for minor errors that build up over time. This suggests the Maya were highly advanced in their astronomical understanding and mathematics, using this knowledge to maintain their spiritual connection to the cosmos and guide important rituals.
chinese_title: 科学家揭示玛雅人如何预测了几个世纪的日食
chinese_summary:
研究人员破解德累斯顿古抄本中的玛雅历法密码，揭示该文明如何准确预测数个世纪的日食。德累斯顿古抄本是前殖民时期玛雅社会幸存的罕见文献，包含详细的天文和占星信息，其中包括一个跨越405个太阴月（11960天）的表格，用于预测日食。

多年来，科学家们一直难以理解该表格的运作方式，主流理论认为它以连续循环的方式运行。然而，语言学家约翰·贾斯提森和考古学家贾斯汀·洛瑞提出了一种新的解释，认为该表格并没有在其最终位置重置。相反，他们认为应该在当前表格的第358个月开始一个新的表格。

他们的研究表明，玛雅人在前一个表格的第358个月（偶尔也在第223个月）启动一个新的表格，以对累积的偏差进行微调。通过将该表格与现代天文数据进行比较，研究人员发现，这种方法将使玛雅人能够准确预测公元350年至1150年间在其区域可见的每一次日食，并考虑到随着时间推移而产生的细微误差。这表明玛雅人在天文理解和数学方面非常先进，利用这些知识来维持他们与宇宙的精神联系并指导重要的仪式。

title: Loose wire leads to blackout, contact with Francis Scott Key bridge
summary: The containership Dali experienced a blackout caused by a loose wire, leading to its collision with Baltimore’s Francis Scott Key Bridge. This blackout likely disabled the ship's propulsion and steering systems, rendering it unable to avoid the bridge. The accident resulted in the bridge's collapse and significant disruption to maritime traffic in the area. Investigations are underway to determine the exact sequence of events and contributing factors beyond the initial loose wire. The blackout and subsequent collision underscore the critical importance of reliable electrical systems on large vessels and the potential for catastrophic consequences when these systems fail. The economic impact of the bridge collapse is expected to be substantial, affecting supply chains and local businesses.
chinese_title: 电线松动导致停电，并撞击弗朗西斯·斯科特·基大桥
chinese_summary: “达利”号集装箱船因电线松动导致断电，进而撞上巴尔的摩弗朗西斯·斯科特·基大桥。此次断电可能导致该船的推进和转向系统失灵，使其无法避开大桥。事故造成大桥坍塌，并对该地区的海上交通造成严重干扰。目前正在进行调查，以确定除最初的电线松动之外的确切事件顺序和促成因素。此次断电和随后的碰撞突显了大型船舶上可靠电力系统的重要性，以及这些系统发生故障可能造成的灾难性后果。预计大桥坍塌将对经济产生重大影响，波及供应链和当地企业。

title: The lost cause of the Lisp machines
summary:
The author expresses frustration with persistent nostalgia for Lisp machines, arguing they were a temporary solution that are best left in the past. While acknowledging their innovative development environments, he contends these were not hardware-dependent and could be replicated on modern systems. He refutes claims of superior speed, pointing out that modern compilers and hardware outperform Lisp machines. The user-microcodable nature of the machines is downplayed as primarily a tool for the manufacturers, not the users.

While conceding that Lisp machines offered a unique, low-level access to the system, he acknowledges the severe lack of security inherent in this approach. The author also argues that modern Lisp compilers are sophisticated and efficient, negating the need for specialized hardware. The argument that Lisp machines had superior keyboards is dismissed as irrelevant to Lisp itself.

Ultimately, the author likens Lisp machine romanticism to "gear acquisition syndrome," suggesting it is a distraction from the hard work and talent required for innovation. Instead of mourning the past, the author encourages Lisp enthusiasts to focus on building the future of Lisp on current technology. He also speculates on the potential for using cheap, powerful GPU farms for novel applications, similar to the evolution of HPC systems after the decline of dedicated designs.
chinese_title: Lisp机器的失败事业
chinese_summary:
作者对持续怀念Lisp机器感到不满，认为它们是应该留在过去的临时解决方案。他承认其创新性的开发环境，但辩称这些并不依赖于硬件，可以在现代系统上复制。他驳斥了速度更快的说法，指出现代编译器和硬件的性能优于Lisp机器。机器的用户可微码特性被淡化为主要为制造商而非用户提供的工具。

虽然承认Lisp机器提供了对系统的独特的、低级别的访问权限，但他承认这种方法固有的严重安全性不足。作者还认为，现代Lisp编译器是复杂且高效的，从而消除了对专用硬件的需求。Lisp机器拥有卓越键盘的说法被认为与Lisp本身无关而被驳回。

最终，作者将对Lisp机器的浪漫主义比作“装备获取综合症”，表明这分散了创新所需的努力和才能。作者鼓励Lisp爱好者专注于利用当前技术构建Lisp的未来，而不是哀悼过去。他还推测了使用廉价、强大的GPU集群进行新颖应用程序的潜力，类似于专用设计衰落后HPC系统的演变。

title: Wrapping my head around AI wrappers
summary:
This article explores the debate around "AI wrappers" – applications built on top of existing AI models – and why some succeed while others fail. It argues that simply dismissing something as an AI wrapper misses the point; the key lies in whether it's a fleeting feature or a lasting product, and the size of the market segment it addresses.

The author contends that basic wrappers solving narrow problems (like chatting with a PDF) are often destined to be absorbed by larger platforms as features are bundled into existing suites. However, these can still generate revenue as independent businesses until that happens.

True product potential lies in larger market segments, but these face competition from both model providers (like OpenAI) who can improve their models and incorporate the functionality, and incumbents with established distribution networks. Examples like coding assistants illustrate the challenges of model access and dependence. The article highlights how Cursor, an AI IDE, relies on external models and faces rate limits, prompting users to migrate to solutions that offer more reliable access.

The author emphasizes that success depends on several factors: living where work is done, writing to proprietary systems of record, building proprietary data from user behavior, and establishing distribution before incumbents integrate AI. Incumbents with existing workflows and data advantages are well-positioned to leverage AI. Finally, smaller niche markets exist that are too small for major players but can sustain profitable indie businesses. The article concludes that successful "wrappers" are those that solve users' needs effectively, adapt to competition, and develop moats that go beyond simply accessing an AI model.
chinese_title: 理解AI封装器
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了围绕“AI封装应用”（构建于现有AI模型之上的应用程序）的争论，以及一些成功而另一些失败的原因。文章认为，简单地将某事物视为AI封装应用是片面的；关键在于它是昙花一现的功能还是持久的产品，以及它所针对的市场细分规模。

作者认为，解决狭隘问题的基本封装应用（例如与PDF聊天）通常注定会被更大的平台吸收，因为这些功能会被捆绑到现有的套件中。然而，在这种情况发生之前，它们仍然可以作为独立的业务产生收入。

真正的产品潜力在于更大的市场细分，但这些细分市场面临着来自模型提供商（如OpenAI，他们可以改进他们的模型并整合这些功能）以及具有成熟分销网络的现有企业的竞争。像代码助手这样的例子说明了模型访问和依赖的挑战。文章强调了AI IDE（集成开发环境）Cursor如何依赖外部模型并面临速率限制，促使用户迁移到提供更可靠访问的解决方案。

作者强调，成功取决于几个因素：在工作场所提供服务，写入专有的记录系统，从用户行为中构建专有数据，并在现有企业整合AI之前建立分销渠道。拥有现有工作流程和数据优势的现有企业有充分的优势来利用AI。最后，存在一些较小的利基市场，这些市场对于主要参与者来说太小，但可以维持盈利的独立业务。文章总结说，成功的“封装应用”是那些有效解决用户需求、适应竞争并开发超越简单访问AI模型的护城河的应用。

title: Verifying your Matrix devices is becoming mandatory
summary: This short announcement highlights an important security update for the Matrix ecosystem. The core message is that a coordinated security fix has been released for all Matrix server implementations as part of the Matrix 1.16 update. This is described as an "off-cycle spec update," suggesting its urgency. The announcement also mentions that Matrix device verification is becoming mandatory, implying that users will be required to verify their devices for enhanced security. Finally, "Element Security" is mentioned and the date "11/08/2025", though the connection to the main point is unclear from this extract alone. It is possible that is either the date this security information was released, or the date where the verification is becoming mandatory.
chinese_title: 验证您的 Matrix 设备正变得强制性
chinese_summary: 本简短公告强调了Matrix生态系统的一项重要安全更新。核心信息是，作为Matrix 1.16更新的一部分，所有Matrix服务器实现都发布了一个协同安全修复程序。这被描述为“非周期性规范更新”，表明其紧迫性。公告还提到Matrix设备验证将成为强制性措施，这意味着用户将被要求验证其设备以增强安全性。最后，提到了“Element Security”以及日期“2025年11月8日”，但从这段摘录来看，与主旨的关联尚不清楚。可能指的是此安全信息发布日期，或者设备验证成为强制性措施的日期。

title: Researchers discover security vulnerability in WhatsApp
summary:
Researchers from the University of Vienna and SBA Research discovered a privacy vulnerability in WhatsApp's contact discovery mechanism that allowed the enumeration of 3.5 billion accounts. By querying a high volume of phone numbers, they were able to confirm active accounts and extract public data like phone number, public keys, timestamps, profile picture, and "about" text, which allowed them to infer operating systems, account age, and linked devices.

The research revealed wider insights, including active WhatsApp accounts in countries where it's banned, global distribution of Android vs. iOS usage, regional differences in privacy settings, potential weaknesses in unofficial clients, and the continued activity of phone numbers leaked in the 2021 Facebook data breach. While the study didn't access message content, it highlighted privacy risks arising from metadata collection and analysis.

Meta has since addressed the vulnerability in collaboration with the researchers by implementing rate-limiting and stricter profile information visibility. WhatsApp VP of Engineering, Nitin Gupta, stated that no non-public data was accessed, user messages remained private due to end-to-end encryption, and the researchers securely deleted the collected data. The researchers emphasized the importance of continuous security research and collaboration with industry to improve user privacy. Their research will be presented at the NDSS Symposium in 2026.
chinese_title: 研究人员发现WhatsApp安全漏洞
chinese_summary:
维也纳大学和SBA Research的研究人员发现了WhatsApp联系人发现机制中的一个隐私漏洞，该漏洞允许枚举35亿个账户。通过查询大量电话号码，他们能够确认活跃账户，并提取公开数据，如电话号码、公钥、时间戳、头像和“关于”文本，从而推断出操作系统、账户年龄和关联设备。

该研究揭示了更广泛的见解，包括在被禁国家/地区活跃的WhatsApp账户、Android与iOS使用的全球分布、隐私设置的区域差异、非官方客户端的潜在弱点，以及2021年Facebook数据泄露中泄露的电话号码的持续活动。虽然该研究没有访问消息内容，但它强调了元数据收集和分析带来的隐私风险。

Meta随后与研究人员合作解决了该漏洞，实施了速率限制和更严格的个人资料信息可见性。WhatsApp工程副总裁Nitin Gupta表示，没有访问非公开数据，由于端到端加密，用户消息仍然是私密的，研究人员安全地删除了收集的数据。研究人员强调了持续安全研究和与行业合作以改善用户隐私的重要性。他们的研究成果将于2026年在NDSS研讨会上发表。

title: Judgement on Dr Matthew Garrett (@mjg59) vs. Dr Roy Schestowitz (Techrights.org)
summary:
This document outlines the introduction and preliminary issues in a libel and data protection case between Dr. Matthew Garrett, a free software activist and employee of NVIDIA, and Dr. Roy and Mrs. Rianne Schestowitz, operators of the free software websites Techrights and Tuxmachines.

Dr. Garrett is suing the Schestowitzes over 24 publications on their websites in August and September 2023, alleging libel and data protection violations. The Schestowitzes are counterclaiming harassment.

The Schestowitzes initially filed a defense but later chose to represent themselves in court and decided not to submit any evidence or call witnesses due to financial constraints. This decision significantly limits their ability to defend their case.

The court addresses the preliminary issues for the defamation claim, focusing on determining the "single natural and ordinary meaning" of the publications. This involves understanding how a reasonable reader would interpret the words, considering context and avoiding overly legalistic analysis. The judgment clarifies the distinction between fact and opinion, highlighting that the test is objective.

The court also considers whether the publications have a defamatory tendency, meaning if they would negatively impact the attitude of others towards Dr. Garrett.

A table summarizing the parties' arguments regarding the meaning of the publications is provided in Annex B. The court notes that the publications accuse Dr. Garrett of various online behaviors, including cybercrime, hate crime, blackmail, issuing threats, defamation, harassment, and online abuse. They also allege he is an uncontrolled user of illegal drugs, specifically crack cocaine. The judge leaned towards the Claimant's arguments that the criminal allegations made are statements of fact, and favored the Defendant's opinion that the allegations of racism and misogyny, etc are expressions of evaluative opinion. The court acknowledges that the publications are undoubtedly "grossly defamatory."
chinese_title: 马修·加勒特博士 (@mjg59) 诉 罗伊·舍斯托维茨博士 (Techrights.org) 判决
chinese_summary:
本文概述了自由软件活动家、英伟达员工马修·加勒特博士与自由软件网站Techrights和Tuxmachines的运营者罗伊·谢斯托维茨博士及其夫人里安妮·谢斯托维茨之间诽谤和数据保护案件的介绍和初步问题。

加勒特博士起诉谢斯托维茨夫妇，指控他们在2023年8月和9月在其网站上发布的24篇出版物构成诽谤和违反数据保护。谢斯托维茨夫妇反诉骚扰。

谢斯托维茨夫妇最初提交了辩护，但后来选择在法庭上自行辩护，并因财政拮据而决定不提交任何证据或传唤证人。这一决定大大限制了他们为自己辩护的能力。

法院处理了诽谤索赔的初步问题，重点是确定出版物的“单一自然和通常含义”。 这涉及理解一个理性读者将如何解读这些词语，同时考虑到上下文，并避免过度法律化的分析。判决澄清了事实和观点之间的区别，强调测试是客观的。

法院还考虑了这些出版物是否具有诽谤倾向，这意味着它们是否会对他人对加勒特博士的态度产生负面影响。

附件B中提供了一个总结双方关于出版物含义的论点的表格。法院指出，这些出版物指控加勒特博士存在各种在线行为，包括网络犯罪、仇恨犯罪、敲诈勒索、发出威胁、诽谤、骚扰和在线辱骂。他们还声称他是一个不受控制的非法毒品使用者，特别是快克可卡因。法官倾向于原告的论点，即所提出的犯罪指控是事实陈述，并倾向于被告的观点，即种族主义和厌女症等指控是评价性意见的表达。 法院承认，这些出版物无疑是“极具诽谤性的”。
